Package com.platform.auth.internal

    Entity for auditing authentication attempts.

    AuthenticationAttemptRepository
    Repository for authentication attempt audit records.
    OAuth2AuditEvent
    OAuth2 Audit Event entity for compliance logging and security monitoring Records all OAuth2-related activities for audit trails and forensic analysis

    Audit severity levels
    OAuth2AuditEvent.OAuth2EventType
    OAuth2 Event Types for audit logging

    Event published when an audit event is created
    OAuth2ConfigurationService
    Service for OAuth2 configuration operations.
    OAuth2ConfigurationService.ProviderInfo
    DTO for OAuth2 provider information to avoid exposing internal details.
    OAuth2Provider
    OAuth2 Provider entity representing configured OAuth2 authentication providers Stores provider configuration and metadata for Google, GitHub, Microsoft, etc.
    OAuth2ProviderRepository
    Repository for OAuth2Provider entities.
    OAuth2ProvidersService
    Service for managing OAuth2 provider configurations and metadata.
    OAuth2ProvidersService.OAuth2ProviderInfo
    OAuth2 provider information DTO
    OAuth2Session
    OAuth2 Session entity representing active user authentication sessions Stores session metadata and links to user information from OAuth2 providers
    OAuth2SessionRepository
    Repository for OAuth2Session entities.
    OAuth2SessionService
    Service for managing OAuth2 sessions using OAuth2-specific entities.

    Exception for OAuth2 session operations
    OAuth2SessionService.OAuth2SessionInfo
    OAuth2 session information
    OAuth2SessionService.OAuth2SessionResult
    Result of OAuth2 session creation
    OAuth2UserInfo
    OAuth2 User Information entity storing user profile data from OAuth2 providers Contains standardized user information retrieved from Google, GitHub, Microsoft, etc.
    OAuth2UserInfoRepository
    Repository for OAuth2UserInfo entities.
    OAuth2UserInfoView
    Read-only projection of OAuth2UserInfo for API layer.
    OAuth2UserService
    Service for managing OAuth2 user information and provider data synchronization.
    OAuth2UserService.OAuth2ProviderStats

    OAuth2UserService.OAuth2UserInfoResult
    User information result for API responses
    OAuth2UserService.OAuth2UserServiceException
    Exception for OAuth2 user service operations
    OAuth2UserService.OAuth2UserStats
    User statistics record
    OpaqueTokenStore
    Opaque token storage implementation using database persistence.
